view

Interface IModelControlAdapter<TUpdateDropListItem,TPaintDropListItem>

  • Type Parameters:
    TUpdateDropListItem - An item in the dropdown list of the gui relating to updating
    TPaintDropListItem - An item in the dropdown list of the gui relating to paintin

    public interface IModelControlAdapter<TUpdateDropListItem,TPaintDropListItem>
    Adapter that the view uses to communicate to the model for non-repetitive control tasks such as manipulating strategies.
    Author:
    swong

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TPaintDropListItem addPaintStrategyFac(java.lang.String shapename)
      Gets an IPaintStrategyFac from the model that produces Strategies of the given name
      TUpdateDropListItem addUpdateStrategy(java.lang.String classname)
      Take the given short strategy name and return a corresponding something to put onto both drop lists.
      void clearAllShapes()
      Tells the model to clear all of the balls on the panel.
      TUpdateDropListItem combineUpdateStrategies(TUpdateDropListItem selectedItem1, TUpdateDropListItem selectedItem2)
      Return a new object to put on both lists, given two items from the lists.
      void makeShape(TUpdateDropListItem selectedUpdateStrategy, TPaintDropListItem selectedShapeFac)
      Make a ball with the selected short strategy name.
      void makeSwitcherShape(TUpdateDropListItem selectedUpdateStrategy, TPaintDropListItem selectedShapeFac)
      Makes a ball with the Switcher strategy
      void switchUpdateStrategy(TUpdateDropListItem selectedItem)
      Switches the composed strategy of the SwitcherStrategy to selectedItem

    • Method Detail

      • addUpdateStrategy

        TUpdateDropListItem addUpdateStrategy(java.lang.String classname)
        Take the given short strategy name and return a corresponding something to put onto both drop lists.
        Parameters:
        classname - The shortened class name of the desired strategy
        Returns:
        Something to put onto both the drop lists.

      • addPaintStrategyFac

        TPaintDropListItem addPaintStrategyFac(java.lang.String shapename)
        Gets an IPaintStrategyFac from the model that produces Strategies of the given name
        Parameters:
        shapename - The paint strategy to be produced
        Returns:
        The IPaintStrategyFac that produces the given paint strategy

      • makeShape

        void makeShape(TUpdateDropListItem selectedUpdateStrategy,
               TPaintDropListItem selectedShapeFac)
        Make a ball with the selected short strategy name.
        Parameters:
        selectedUpdateStrategy - An update strategy factory for the ball
        selectedShapeFac - a paint strategy factory for the ball

      • combineUpdateStrategies

        TUpdateDropListItem combineUpdateStrategies(TUpdateDropListItem selectedItem1,
                                            TUpdateDropListItem selectedItem2)
        Return a new object to put on both lists, given two items from the lists.
        Parameters:
        selectedItem1 - An object from one drop list
        selectedItem2 - An object from the other drop list
        Returns:
        An object to put back on both lists.

      • clearAllShapes

        void clearAllShapes()
        Tells the model to clear all of the balls on the panel.

      • makeSwitcherShape

        void makeSwitcherShape(TUpdateDropListItem selectedUpdateStrategy,
                       TPaintDropListItem selectedShapeFac)
        Makes a ball with the Switcher strategy
        Parameters:
        selectedUpdateStrategy - An update strategy factory for the ball
        selectedShapeFac - a paint strategy factory for the ball

      • switchUpdateStrategy

        void switchUpdateStrategy(TUpdateDropListItem selectedItem)
        Switches the composed strategy of the SwitcherStrategy to selectedItem
        Parameters:
        selectedItem - An item from one drop list
